sub_title: Sales Specialist Detection and DreamPrep NGS at Tecan Benelux
summary:
I am a people-oriented, enthusiastic and driven medical biologist (MSc) with experience in sales and education. I am fascinated by the sophisticated human body and my passion is to help others by transferring medical/scientific knowledge and innovations. 

I have successfully completed the Bachelor Biology and Master Medical Biology, including the specialization Science, Management & Innovation (SMI). Thanks to this interdisciplinary specialization, I developed knowledge and skills in the field of Innovation Management, Marketing and Sales. My key competence is combining my scientific background with my commercial and communication skills. I started my career as Technical Sales Associate at NBS Scientific, which is a distributor of laboratory products. Since November 2020, I work as Sales Specialist Detection at Tecan, at which I am responsible for the sales of multi-mode microplate readers and plate washers in the Netherlands. From July 2022 onwards, I am also responsible for the sales of the DreampPrep NGS, which is a fully-automated NGS library prep solution.
